title: Rename site to "yor txt" across UI and document title

requirements.summary: Replace all user-visible instances of the old app name with "yor txt" in shared layout UI (header brand and footer copyright).
acceptanceCriteria: The header brand label displays "yor txt" on all pages.
The footer copyright line displays "© <current year> yor txt. All rights reserved."
No remaining user-visible instances of the old app name (e.g., "Story Share") appear in the rendered UI.

file_operations.description: Update the top-left brand text from the previous name (currently rendered as "Story Share") to "yor txt" so it displays consistently on all routes.
Update the footer copyright line to render "© {currentYear} yor txt. All rights reserved." instead of the previous name.

requirements.summary: Update the HTML document <title> to use "yor txt".
acceptanceCriteria: The browser tab title contains "yor txt".
The previous title text is no longer present in frontend/index.html.

file_operations.description: Replace the current <title> text with a title that uses "yor txt".
